attributes.action: England Football Matches to be broadcasted on Terrestrial TV
attributes.additional_details:
It is wrong that in the current economic climate football fans should be made to pay subscription fees to watch an England International Football game on television.

A country now trying to re-establish grass roots football is depriving millions of children from watching there own country play in football matches

Sign this petition now to provoke a debate that will hopefully see all England Football Games returned to one of the Free-to-Air channels.
